name: BrightID
description: A DAO powered by 1Hive Gardens and Aragon technologies is the best structure to achieve this. $BRIGHT is the token that makes BrightDAO work. A fairdrop and ongoing fair distribution mechanisms (think BrightID-enabled faucets) are the best ways to allocate $BRIGHT. (A “fairdrop” simply means some or all rewards are given per person instead of per address.)
